Up-Chuck Peep - 번들팩 - 창백한 화이트
Up-Chuck Peep - Bundle Pack - Pasty White
Up-Chuck Peep 組合包 – 麵糊白
Up-Chuck Peep 組合包 – 麵糊白
Up-Chuck - Bundle Pack - Pasty White
kDesc

Up-Chuck is one wild and crazy guy and the life of every party! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Heavy Pet Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control your Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Up-Chuck - Pasty White
 ・Up-Chuck Peep - Static Mini - Pasty White
 ・Up-Chuck - Heavy Pet - Pasty White


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Up-Chuck est un gars fou-furieux et une boule-en-train! C'est trois en un avec Peep Fun supplémentaire! Ramène ton Heavy Pet Peep à ton appartement et que la fête commence. Tu peux contrôler ton peep avec des animations personnalisées et manœuvres spéciales. Prends le à l'extérieur de ton appartement comme compagnon ou expose le à ton appartement dans sa boîte Peep-a- Boo box. Rassemble les tous et entasse les pour que tous puissent les voir.[#Legal]

Up-Chuck ist ein wilder und verrückter Typ und eine echte Stimmungskanone! Er kommt im Dreier-Pack mit extra Peep-Spaß! Bring dein Heavy Pet Peep in deine Wohnung und der Spaß beginnt. Du kannst dein Peep mit benutzerdefinierten Animationen und Bewegungen steuern. Nimm ihn als Gefährten mit nach draußen oder stelle ihn in deiner Wohnung in seiner Peep-a-Boo Kiste aus. Sammle sie alle und stelle sie für Alle zur Schau aus![#Legal]

Up-Chuck é un tipo pazzo e scatenato, ed é l'anima della festa! Divertimento extra Peep al tre per uno! Porta il tuo Heavy Pet Peep nel tuo appartamento e che il divertimento abbia inizio . Puoi controllare il tuo Peep con animazioni e movimenti fatti a posta. Portalo fuori dal tuo appartamento come Companion o mettilo in mostra nel tuo appartamento dentro la sua scatola Peep-a-Boo. Collezionali tutti quanti e mettili in mostra perché tutti possano vederli![#Legal]

Up-Chuck es un tipo loco y es el alma de la fiesta! Más diversión Peep al tres por uno! Lleva a tu Heavy Pet Peep a tu departamento y que empieze la diversión. Puedes controlar a tu Peep con animaciones y movimientos personalizados. Sácalo de tu departamento como Companion o pónlo de muestra en tu departamento en su propia caja Peep-a-Boo. Colecciónalos todos y amontónalos para que los vea todo el mundo![#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_28 [#Legal]

Up-Chuck은 거칠고 성깔 있는 친구로 모든 파티 분위기를 업시켜 준답니다! 추가 Peep으로 세 가지 즐거움을 누려보세요! Heavy Pet Peep을 아파트로 데려와 신나게 놀아 보세요. 사용자 지정 애니메이션과 모션으로 Peep을 컨트롤할 수 있습니다! 친구처럼 아파트 밖에 데려가거나 Peep-A-Boo 박스에 디스플레이된 Mini-Peep을 아파트에 데려다 놓아보세요. Mini-Peep을 모두 모아 친구들에게 자랑해 보세요!
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Up-Chuck Peep - 창백한 화이트
 ●Up-Chuck Peep - Static Mini - 창백한 화이트
 ●Up-Chuck Peep - Heavy Pet - 창백한 화이트


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다.[#Legal]

Up-Chuck is one wild and crazy guy and the life of every party! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Heavy Pet Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control your Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Up-Chuck Peep - Pasty White
 ・Up-Chuck Peep - Static Mini - Pasty White
 ・Up-Chuck Peep - Heavy Pet - Pasty White


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle.[#Legal]

Up-Chuck野性瘋狂，是派對的靈魂人物！給您特別的Peep樂趣！帶Heavy PetPeep進入您家，盡情享樂。您可以用自訂動態和動作來控制Peep。他可以作為隨身夥伴和您一起外出，或者您可以將他放進專用Peep-A-Boo盒子並成為家居擺設。集齊全套，向朋友炫耀一下吧！本組合包含以下商品：


●Up-Chuck Peep - 麵糊白
 ●Up-Chuck Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 麵糊白
 ●Up-Chuck Peep - Heavy Pet - 麵糊白


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
